Hello world!

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Generate some data
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

# Create the plot
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
plt.plot(x, y, label="Sine Wave")
plt.title("Test Plot")
plt.xlabel("X-axis")
plt.ylabel("Y-axis")
plt.legend()
plt.grid(True)

# Save the plot to display it in the blog post
plt.savefig("test_plot.png")
plt.show()
```
